description: Mojitos are a summer classic, but who says you can't enjoy them year-round? This recipe for Pumpkin Mojito is sure going to change your mind about that!
name: Pumpkin Mojito
recipeIngredient: 11 Mint leaves, plus a sprig for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add the mint, sugar, and rum to a shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the mint, sugar, and rum to a shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle until all of the ingredients come together, and you smell an intense aroma from the mint leaves.
recipeInstructions.text: Muddle until all of the ingredients come together, and you smell an intense aroma from the mint leaves.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour this mixture into a tall glass filled with ice cubes and stir in pumpkin puree and lime juice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour this mixture into a tall glass filled with ice cubes and stir in pumpkin puree and lime juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off the drink with club soda.
recipeInstructions.text: Top off the drink with club soda.
